name: store
description: A more user-friendly way to interact with various HTML5 storage libraries
author: Riley Hilliard <rileyhilliard@gmail.com> (http://rileyh.com)

scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o dist/store.js && git add . && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" ; npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git push --tags && npm publish
